Normal Paragraphs

Consectetur adipisicing elit. Mollitia, voluptate dolor architecto excepturi adipisci pariatur laboriosam quos quo nulla? Ab vero temporibus animi voluptatibus dicta vitae possimus eveniet aliquam quam molestiae, dolores sapiente reiciendis error vel incidunt soluta nesciunt recusandae necessitatibus, quasi maxime, voluptatum esse sint autem excepturi. Nihil, blanditiis.

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Explicabo enim blanditiis tenetur eius maxime fuga? Ullam, repellat inventore! Ducimus, illo ea? Rem exercitationem itaque ut neque voluptatem? Quam odio, optio eveniet quas exercitationem qui perspiciatis?

Special Paragraphs with class name

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Atque alias excepturi quam blanditiis facere incidunt, expedita, optio deleniti molestiae nostrum vero cumque doloremque aliquid, odit quia veniam dolores velit soluta quibusdam quisquam! Omnis, repudiandae animi.

Impedit corporis quidem architecto vero quo ea voluptas autem nisi vel reiciendis neque quis iure suscipit doloribus rerum labore dolore quasi explicabo, accusantium accusamus! Voluptates quasi labore, reiciendis delectus dignissimos sint! Facilis, eius.

Normal Paragraphs

You can use the mark tag to highlight text.

                                                        
                                                            <p>You can use the mark tag to <mark>highlight</mark> text.</p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.

                                                        
                                                            <p><s>This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.</s></p>

This line of text will render as underlined

                                                        
                                                            <p><u>This line of text will render as underlined</u></p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.

                                                        
                                                            <p><small>This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.</small></p>

This line rendered as bold text.

                                                        
                                                            <p><strong>This line rendered as bold text.</strong></p>

This line rendered as italicized text.

                                                        
                                                            <p><em>This line rendered as italicized text.</em></p>
